name: Suspicious Get Local Groups Information
description:
Adversaries may attempt to find local system groups and permission settings.
The knowledge of local system permission groups can help adversaries determine which groups exist and which users belong to a particular group.
Adversaries may use this information to determine which users have elevated permissions, such as the users found within the local administrators group.
query: (winlog.event_data.Payload:(/.*[Gg][Ee][Tt]\-[Ll][Oo][Cc][Aa][Ll][Gg][Rr][Oo][Uu][Pp].*/ OR /.*[Gg][Ee][Tt]\-[Ll][Oo][Cc][Aa][Ll][Gg][Rr][Oo][Uu][Pp][Mm][Ee][Mm][Bb][Ee][Rr].*/) OR winlog.event_data.ContextInfo:(/.*[Gg][Ee][Tt]\-[Ll][Oo][Cc][Aa][Ll][Gg][Rr][Oo][Uu][Pp].*/ OR /.*[Gg][Ee][Tt]\-[Ll][Oo][Cc][Aa][Ll][Gg][Rr][Oo][Uu][Pp][Mm][Ee][Mm][Bb][Ee][Rr].*/) OR (winlog.event_data.Payload:/.*[Gg][Ee][Tt]\-[Ww][Mm][Ii][Oo][Bb][Jj][Ee][Cc][Tt].*/ AND winlog.event_data.Payload:/.*[Ww][Ii][Nn]32_[Gg][Rr][Oo][Uu][Pp].*/) OR (winlog.event_data.ContextInfo:/.*[Gg][Ee][Tt]\-[Ww][Mm][Ii][Oo][Bb][Jj][Ee][Cc][Tt].*/ AND winlog.event_data.ContextInfo:/.*[Ww][Ii][Nn]32_[Gg][Rr][Oo][Uu][Pp].*/))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.event_data.Payload:(*get\-localgroup* OR *Get\-LocalGroupMember*) OR winlog.event_data.ContextInfo:(*get\-localgroup* OR *Get\-LocalGroupMember*) OR (winlog.event_data.Payload:*Get\-WMIObject* AND winlog.event_data.Payload:*Win32_Group*) OR (winlog.event_data.ContextInfo:*Get\-WMIObject* AND winlog.event_data.ContextInfo:*Win32_Group*))`
